attributes.action: For the recognition of MOD & Forces ID cards at ALL public venues as proof of age without exceptions or conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Armed Service personel are being refused entry to public venues whilst using the current Forces Identity Card as proof of age, this is not recognised by local authorities as a valid form of identity or proof of age. troops on R & R or pre-post operational deployment without access to civilian documents are experiancing access discrimination due to this fact.
